segments.text: Premium , PLS . Could you check my tyres , too ? I think they need air .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , Madam . Should I check the air in the spare tyre as well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . It's brand-new .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should I clean the windshield for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , PLS . I also need you to check the oil and the radiator .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Madam . It's ok . There is hardly any water in the radiator . It's dangerous , Madam . You could break down , because of the heat you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pls fill it up with water then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we don't . I am sorry . It's 30 dollars and 10 cents in total .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 30 dollars and 10 cents ? Here you go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Madam . Have a nice drive !
segments.speaker: S2
